StripePaymentForm.securedPaymentTooltip: We support all major payment providers.
StripePaymentForm.CVVTooltipVisaMaster: Visa and Mastercard display the 3-digit CVV number on the back of the card, to the right of the signature.
StripePaymentForm.CVVTooltipAMex: American Express Card displays the 4-digit CVV number on the front of the card.
StripePaymentForm.paymentError: Something went wrong while processing the card
